ygData.subject: Re: The Blackfortress
ygData.msgSnippet: Ignatius stayed underwater waiting for his targets. the ambush was set. Suddenly shots entered the water whizzing past Ignatius. Damn they spotted me. Random

Ignatius stayed underwater waiting for his targets. the ambush was set.

Suddenly shots entered the water whizzing past Ignatius. "Damn they spotted
me." Random shots struck the bot forcing him deeper in the water. He waited
until Slayer flew by followed by his two pursuers. Ignatius fired two
missles from his wings (One at each) and rattled off 25 shots from his
talons.

Deepfear/Charon::

The bot appeared in surface (in land), they changed to Vehicle mode
and started to shoot against iguanus. Deepfear shot 22 missiles,
while Charon shot 25.

(I think fireing 47 missles in one post is illegal so I'll trim it down a
little.) Missles rained down into the water exploding all around the bot. he
tried to get to the surface so he could get into the air when an explosion
sent him flipping through the water. He tried to regain his composure but
couldn't figure out which way was up. He scanned the area and detected
something moving in the water. Whatever it was it was bigger than him. It
was trouble. (Thyphon.)

Slayers voice echoed over the comm.  "Its no use," he says to Ignatis over
the comm, "There're hordes of the maintenance bots. Lets get out of here.
Don't return to base,
give them a nice chase till they lay off."

"So I noticed." Ignatius thought as the action continued around him. He swam
toward Slayers signal knowing that way was up. He kept a scan on whatever
was nearby knowing sooner or later it would make it's move.







----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 9:54 AM
Subject: Re: The Blackfortress


> ::Slayer::
>
> "Allright. Be ready," Slayer replies to Ignatis, suddenly turning to
> head right toward the bots following him. He sets his jets on maximum
> burn, zoomning over the Predacons' heads and firing two signature
> seeking missiles when he was right above them, and then slowing down
> slightly so that they could keep up. He was heading toward Ignatis's
> position.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Ignatius detected enemy fire from long range. The eagle went into a
> > powerdive avoiding the shots. "So that's the game. I'll teach them
> my
> > rules." he fired two wing missles at Attila and five bursts from his
> eyes at
> > Luzbel. He stayed close to the water trying to use the water to
> confuse the
> > sensors. He knew that the closer he got the more likely he'd be
> detected and
> > attacked.
> >
> > The call to retreat came through from Slayer. "We can't retreat yet,
> I'm
> > barely warmed up." he wanted to rescue the leader even though he
> knew that
> > Prebon had made a strategic mistake (To put it lightly) attacking
> the Iron
> > fist. He vowed allegiance to his leader and intended to follow it
> through to
> > the end.
> >
> > Long range scanners showed Slayer going the opposite direction. He
> switched
> > frequencies and called Slayer again. "Lead them back toward me, I'll
> lay
> > down coverfire." Ignatius wasn't facing fire from the fortress so he
> knew
> > that he was out of range. He transformed to robot mode and dove into
> the
> > water. he set all operating functions on minimal hoping thier
> attension
> > would
>
